reviews.review: Задумка неплохая,но баланс ужасный. Вообщем игра 7/10
ЕБАНЫЙ ПОДБОР РАНКЕДА! ТОЛЬКО СЕЛ УЧИТЬСЯ ИГРАТЬ НА МАНЕ А ВЫ ПИДАРАСЫ МНЕ К 20 РАНГУ КИДАЕТЕ ПЕРВЫХ СУРВОВ УЁБКИ ВЫ И ВАШЕ ОБНОВЛЕНИЕ

6.5/10

A fun game to play with friends, not so good to play on your own

Buying the game for PC after switching from Xbox its safe to say the game is really fun, playing with friends can be a tense experience as you hide from the killer and complete the games objectives while also being a enjoyable if not hilarious time, the only down fall to playing with friends is that one of you cant be the killer, which i understand if this feature was in the game people would exploit it and grind for bloodpoints and not actually play the game, so its good we have custom matches

another issue is the toxic fanbase, while it can be funny to get the odd try hard who has played the game since day one lose his temper and sanity, it can also be a pain, higher skilled people teabagging hooked lower skilled players and people hook camping when they are the killer, although this isn't all games and i have met very nice people during matches who help new players

another thing is the killer waiting time when playing singles! i bought the game and two DLCs to be forced to wait almost an hour to get into a game as the killer, almost time for me to get halfway through an actual horror movie! i have no idea if this is a bug or just that so many people want to play killer, but on xbox this isn't an issue

All in all it is a really fun game but can be a bit toxic/time consuming
Очень крутая и увлекательная игра для проведения времени с друзьями. А еще жопа сгорела пиздец

Aight, well...I'm re-writing this review. At first I said this game was about a 7/10. Although the fact that this game has one of the more toxic player communities I've seen, it is so fun. Sometimes, yes, this game can be anger inducing, like when a killer camps the hook or is just toxic, or like when a survivor teams with the killer or flashes you with the flashlight over and over for no reason but to make you salty. However, this game is a lot of fun to play. I love getting on with my friends and goofing off, playing serious, or just having a good time with a chill killer. I said before that the DLC isn't worth it, but really I was wrong. I have since bought almost all the DLC since it is fantastic. Well done Devs and thank you for such a great game. One thing I'd love would be a mic chat for survivors and an anti-camping thing for the killer so the game goes a bit more smoothly. Anyway, great game.

игра хорошая, интересная как для одиночки, так и для компании друзей, НО как вы за*бали, ваши обновления качаются по 3 часа, 60 мегабайт устанавливались 10 минут, эта проблема только с вашей игрой, А ПОСЛЕ этой сатанинской установки ТЫ ещё 2 часа будешь проверять целостность файлов, так как не все из них загружатся правильно, причём после обновы в 60 мегабайт, проверку не проходят файлы весом в 800 мегабай С*КА.
O jogo é bem intuitivo e ao mesmo tempo dificil de se dominar, cada personagem tem mecanicas diferentes (principalmente nos killers). Deixa a desejar no ranqueado e no Cross play.

這遊戲的平衡系統過了兩年還是一樣沒救，一陣子過後想回鍋來玩又遇到這白癡隱分系統，各種不可能能的配對都遇上了。永遠遇不到和實力相近的人類，玩人類不是從頭修到尾，鬼一個人都抓不了。不然就是綠段鬼域到四個紅段人類被修/溜到頭破血流。

先不論匹配系統有什麼問題，修發電機速度這個問題兩年前就存在了，回鍋完之後不僅沒有解決甚至還更誇張。
官方根本沒有心要解決平衡這件事，只顧著出DLC賺錢。

如果你是正在考慮要不要入手這款遊戲的人，希望你有看到這則評論，千萬不要買，這遊戲不只對新手十分不友善，也對老玩家一點誠意都沒有。

UPDATE:

At least they fixed some of the gamebreaking bugs but their horrible transparency stays the same. 
The game makes more fun but consider this when buying the game.
The game gets a positive feedback once they interact more with the community.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

dozens of bugs which deny any progress you make throughout the game.
Developers dont seem to communicate to their playerbase of how and when gamebreaking bugs are gonna be fixed
Customer service is very bad (reported multiple gamebreakign bugs and only got standard, automatic generated responses) 
In sum I spent over 1 weak of bugfixing through reddit and youtube to fix bugs the support could have solved within a few hours. 

I love the game but the community management and the support are terrible. Furthermore the bug that half the playerbase cant progress and there is no communication about it leads me to the conclusion that I cant recommend the game as it is.

Sorry Behaviour

玩了这么多游戏，游戏匹配系统最sb的没有之一，你说技术不如别人，怪自己，那tmd新手入门技术不行，配件还比别人差，匹配到的都是红段的人，进来就是完全不公平，进来挨虐的咯？我知道这种多人竞技的游戏就是晚入坑的吃瘪，但我从未见过这么对新手不友好的游戏，守望，彩六我都是入坑较晚的，两个游戏都说对新玩家不友好，但人家一个有隐藏分，一个有新进模式，贵游nb，上来就让你打屠皇，人皇，虐完你以后还要给你来个蹲起，手势嘲讽。这游戏还有一点很sb，只有排位模式！！！！！一个四年的游戏，只有排位模式，没有休闲，没有人机，想熟悉地图，要么挨打，要么自定义，自定义还不像彩六可以自己一个人跑图，必须要有其他人才能开，没有好友一起入坑的就是受苦。祝你贵游永远只有老玩家！

Бегали, прыгали, доски роняли и в капканы мои лезли. 
Я хочу спокойно дома посидеть, а они тут бухие туристы приходят и надо вешать на крюки что бы протрезвелись.

Dead by Daylight is one of the best multiplayer games, ESPECIALLY for horror fans. You get used to the controls and scariness. I believe psychologically it satisfies our need to be a hunter vs a gatherer, whereas other multiplayer games really only allow you to be the aggressor. There are a few things that need to be fixed, but they are improving the game frequently. As a Level 20 survivor (lowest level) I don't stand a chance ranking up if I'm put against a Level 1 Killer (best level). This has been an issue. The other thing is NO CROSS PLATFORM. OR at the very least letting me get all my things from PS4 onto my PC, since that's where I started. DBD will satisfy you at the same time as making you want to rage quit.
Pretty fun, but pretty challenging at first. The matchmaking system is a tad bit broken, but in general people are pretty nice.
